name: Flappy: Fly Bird
description:
Every day a fantastic special mission to earn even more Fruits and win the coin Collect them all! 

=> The hardest and impossible flappy's back now.
=> Flappy's back, so you can challenge more hardest bird game.
=> Flappy's back, so you want to knock down the phone.
=> The impossible flappy game is back for android.
=> You can get the more impossible flappy game more score on device.
=> The flappy's back is better than the original.

[HOW TO PLAY]

- Tap the screen to make Bird Fly
- Avoid Tower
- Conquer the great treasures and beat the score of your friends!
- Select Below 2 Level

1. Bird View
=> Fly bird with Tap Your Mobile Screen and Get more Coin and Avoid to Tower .

2. Fruit View
=> Fruit Bird View you can Tap a screen and Crush Fruit with tower.

*********** Game Features ************

- 2 Main View
- Unlock New Birds with Scores
- Two Modes Day and Night
- One touch controls: touch to flap the wings and fly between columns to get the highest
possible score.
- Easy and fun to play
- Stunning graphics
- Cool Sounds

Download and join Flappy : Fly Bird game NOW!
